title: Game loop crashing, what do i do?
body: When playing a game in my promos, my game wouldnt load the loading screen and just say that my game isnt "connecting" or something like that, booting me out to the reconnect button and bugsplat, i repeated this a few times and restarted pc, by the time i reset, i lost my series and never entered the game, should i just keep trying or reset my pc in this case???? I dont want to do the wrong thing if it ever happens again.

replies.body:
If this starts happening, the best thing to do is take a step back and try to troubleshoot those crashes before queueing back up for pvp matches. Since you're getting disconnected and a few bugsplats as well, let's be sure to tackle those each individually. 

For those disconnects, make sure to check up on your network settings using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). There may be some oddly configured settings somewhere that are giving your connection a hard time.

Bugsplats typically happen when some of the game files become corrupted or damaged. Most of them time a simple repair through the client can help, but if it doesn't go ahead and grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a repair with it as well.
